title: heres another one...does anyone recognise this????
content:
hey, can anyone please tell me what this is...i cant work it out....its abit similar to century gothic and Agenda but isnt either of these. thanks!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706223031im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/EYOE4_5797.jpg)

 [‹ Help with a Caslon lookalike?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706223031/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40722 "Go to previous forum topic") [What font is this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706223031/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40709 "Go to next forum topic")
author: neill k

comments.content: THANKYOU AKIRA!!!!! amazing you got it in one! thankyou so much, the P22 version is fantastic cos its got more available weights than the ITC version.......i should have recognized it really as i used to see it every day when i took the tube....abit pathetic.......nevermind, thanks again for the help!!!!!!
